author: daxian-dbw
body:
.net core NuGet packages released preview2 packages starting from 4/22. This change makes powershell core target preview2 packages.

The following two dotnet issues are addressed with the latest dotnet-cli tool:
https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/17797
https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/6352

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Close this PR as we should move to `netcoreapp` 2.0.0-preview1-002106-00, which is the version dotnet team will use for //Build.

title: Update powershell to use .NET Core 2.0 preview 2 packages
